name: Torstein's Exerpsychic
description:
Torstein is a fitness star with psychic powers working at the Groovy Gym. These powers transmit the correct choreography of dances to the forgetful students during class. Torstein wants to become the Employee of the Month for the 100th time straight, but new students just won’t stop coming! Help Torstein become Employee of the Month!

The new students has to keep up with Torstein, and the game has a quite simple mechanic. The player is required to push the correct keyboard key that corresponds to Torstein's dance move, and afterwards click on the student within the time limit.

I talk more about the game here.
